overview: The Weddings page of the Brighton and Hove Gazette. August 1980. Twenty couples all on one page - captured for a moment in time. What would happen to those happy, smiling couples once they embarked on married life together - What would the intervening 25 years bring with them? Wedding Days proved to be a fascinating journey - a charming, moving film that provided a social history of Britain, a unique perspective of both marriage and of the last quarter of a century.
title: Wedding Days
